get.summary: Endpoint to get the example query with example id

get.summary: Gets all instructions. showOnlyActive flag is used to filter out the inactive instructions.
Gets the instruction with the given instructionId and version. If not found, return the active version. If that is also not found, return the latest version.

delete.summary: Delete instruction with the given instructionId and version.

patch.summary: Patches an instruction with the given instructionId and version.

delete.summary: Delete instruction with the given instructionId and version.

requestBody.description: The query request containing the input parameters
